entries.u1: I can't wait for my next furlough.
entries.u2: So how about this weather, huh?
entries.u3: I wonder if there are any Rebels around.
entries.u4: You know, things just haven't been the same since the Battle of Yavin.
entries.u5: When does my relief get here anyway?
entries.u7: I really need to get my uniform cleaned.
entries.u8: Guard duty's pretty bad, but it's not as bad as fresher duty.
entries.u9: I once had to escort a Wookiee prisoner, that was no fun, I'll tell you!
entries.u11: So I said to the lieutenant, "Look, if you think that soldier's got half a brain in his head..."
entries.u12: ...and then the gambler said, "But that's not the rules of sabaac!" So I pulled out my blaster and...
entries.u13: So the sergeant says, "Regs say you have to be back in time." What a crock.
entries.u14: I got chewed out for not having a sharp enough crease in my slacks.
entries.u15: He thinks he's all high and mighty because he's a Chiss. I hate aliens, I tell you.
entries.u16: They might be be crack troops, but they creep me out. You ever seen one without his helmet on? Hmm?
entries.u17: Yeah, but the real tough ones are the SpecForce guys. They make the regular Rebel army look pathetic.
entries.u18: I've taken down a few SpecForce commandos in my day...
entries.u19: Well, this is my first station since Carida where I've really felt at home.
entries.u20: I lost a cousin on that battle station you know. Of course, I lost a few on Alderaan too.
entries.u21: What I want to know is why the Alliance has to go wrecking everything? Life is pretty good for most, isn't it?
entries.u22: My uncle was on me about killing civilians. I explained that I was just following orders, but he didn't understand.
entries.u23: I've only gotten to ride in a walker once, but it was really very interesting...
entries.u24: I imagine we won't be here long. They'll have us take out some little Rebel outpost, and we'll move again...
entries.u25: Have you heard the one about the Klatooinian, the Ithorian, and the Wookiee?
entries.imperial_npc_greet_1: Look alive man, I'm busy here.
entries.imperial_npc_greet_2: I don't have time to chat right now.  I've got important things to do.
entries.imperial_npc_greet_3: There's nothing more annoying than being bothered when I'm busy.  Yes?
entries.imperial_npc_job_offer_1: Here's the job.  I won't ask if you can do it, cause I'll assume you can.  Now do it.  Ok?
entries.imperial_npc_job_offer_2: I have some tasks if you're interested and you can get them done.  Can you?
entries.imperial_npc_job_offer_3: This is what I have, take it or leave it.
entries.imperial_player_line_1_1: Look alive?  What exactly does that mean?
entries.imperial_npc_response_1_1: It means move, move around.  Look like you're at least pretending to be alive.
entries.imperial_npc_response_2_1: Ok, I'm done talking to you.  You're wasting my time.
entries.imperial_npc_response_3_1: You will if you don't stop bothering me...What?  Too subtle?
entries.imperial_npc_response_1_2: The kinds of important things I can't talk about with you.
entries.imperial_player_line_3_2: So you're not going to tell me?
entries.imperial_npc_response_2_2: That's why I'm not telling you anything.
entries.imperial_player_line_1_3: Sorry, didn't mean to bother you.
entries.imperial_npc_response_1_3: If there's something you need spit it out man!
entries.imperial_player_line_3_3: With that attitude I'm just going to go.
entries.imperial_npc_response_2_3: Just get out of here, will you?
entries.imperial_npc_go_home: Go then.  I don't need someone who doesn't really want to work.
